passive.name: POWER CHORD
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) POWER CHORD
                                After casting 3 basic abilities, her next attack is empowered to deal an additional 20 magic damage (20 (+10 ) + 15% ) and stun for 0.5 seconds.Chord: Casting a basic ability grants Sona a non-stacking buffing aura for 3 seconds.Reduces basic ability cooldowns by 2-20% ().Casting a basic ability places other basic abilities on 0.54 second cooldowns.

q.name: (Q) HYMN OF VALOR
q.description:
(Q) HYMN OF VALOR
 8s   60/65/70/75 
                                
                                
                                Sends out a soundwave that deals 40 magic damage (40/80/120/160 + 40% ) to two nearest enemies (targets champion first).Aura: Gains an aura that last 3 seconds. The next attack by allied champions within the aura is empowered to deal an additional 8 magic damage (8/13/18/23 + 20% ).

w.name: (W) ARIA OF PERSEVERANCE
w.description:
(W) ARIA OF PERSEVERANCE
 10s   85/90/95/100 
                                
                                
                                Heals herself and another allied champion for 25 (25/40/55/70 + 20% ).Aura: Grants allied champions a shield that absorbs 25 damage (25/50/75/100 + 18% ) for 3 seconds.

e.name: (E) SONG OF CELERITY
e.description:
(E) SONG OF CELERITY
 14s   80 
                                
                                
                                Gains 10% Movement Speed (10/11/12/13% + 3% ) for 5 seconds.Aura: Grants an aura that last 5 seconds. Allied champions within the aura gain 10% Movement Speed (10/11/12/13% + 3% ).

r.name: (R) CRESCENDO
r.description:
(R) CRESCENDO
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Passive: After casting an ability, her aura is empowered to grant stronger (to 20%) buffs for 20 seconds.Active: Plays a chord that emits a soundwave every 0.75 seconds as it travels to the target location. The soundwave deals 35 magic damage (35/60/85 + 15% ) and stuns enemies hit for the first time for 1 seconds. Enemies caught inside the chord are also 25/30/35% slowed.
